question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. Is the destination within sight at the current location? If yes, where is the destination in the view?  
choose:  
A. I see the Central ALL-STAR Cafe on the right side of my field of view.  
B. I see the Central ALL-STAR Cafe in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
C. I do not see the Central ALL-STAR Cafe in my field of view.  
D. I see the Central ALL-STAR Cafe to the left of my field of view.  
E. I see the Central ALL-STAR Cafe in the lower right corner of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The Central ALL-STAR Cafe is not visible within the current field of view from the initial position. The perspective shows a road with vehicles and buildings, but the specific destination is not in sight.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 12)]
Option: [C]
Reason: From the initial position (0-12s), the view shows a wide street with buildings and traffic. The Central ALL-STAR Cafe is not visible in the field of view.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The Central ALL-STAR Cafe is not visible within the current field of view from the initial position. The perspective shows a road with vehicles and buildings, but the specific destination is not in sight.
